docs.title: Intro
docs.text:
This is the project that observes the varing of global temperature for the first half of 2021.

Hope you guys enjoy!!! And be helpful for the one who also interested in Atmospheric Science.

docs.title: Create Enviroment
docs.text:
MacOS 11.5.2 conda --version: 4.11.0 

$ conda create --name atmpy38 python=3.8
$ conda activate atmpy38

docs.title: Build web
docs.text:
pip install mkdocs
pip install mkdocs-material
pip install pymdown-extensions
pip install mkdocstrings
pip install mkdocs-git-revision-date-plugin
pip install mkdocs-jupyter

mkdocs serve
mkdocs build

docs.title: Under atmpy38
docs.text:
$ conda install numpy
$ conda install matplotlib
$ conda install -c anaconda basemap
$ conda install -c conda-forge basemap-data-hires
$ conda install -c conda-forge metpy
$ conda install pandas
$ conda install netcdf4
$ conda install -c conda-forge cartopy

docs.title: Verify version
docs.text:
$ conda --version
conda 4.11.0

$ python --version
Python 3.8.16

$ python
>>> from mpl.toolkits.basemap import Basemap
>>> quit()

docs.title: Project Showcase
docs.text: Name Display Global Surface Temperature Draw TAIWAN $CO_2$ Emission
